participant_1.background:
I've worked at my current job for two years, and I still hate popcorn.
i work too many hours in a week.
i am allergic to shellfish and cats.
I'm happy to have met my birth mother, even though it was late in life.
I have been struggling with my mental health recently.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy my job and my family, but I find it hard to keep up with their social expectations.
i teach a yoga class.
I started my own design business, which allows me to work from home and have more flexibility in my schedule.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
I would brag about my unique life story and how I managed to find success despite all the challenges I've faced.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
Doing well, thank you! Just got home from work.
Oh nice, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. It's a lot of work, but I love it!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I'm not sure if I have the patience for it.
It definitely takes a lot of patience, but it's so rewarding when you see your students learn and grow.
I can imagine! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten. It's the best age!
I bet it is! I love kids that age. They're so innocent and full of energy.
They really are. I love getting to see them learn and grow every day.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! That means a lot to me.
No problem! Have a good night!
